description: This Dart source file defines the AppRouter class, which manages the named route configuration, route generation with authentication guards, and navigation helpers for a Flutter mobile application. It sets up route constants, determines initial routes, and handles navigation logic including protected routes based on authentication state.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A class that manages route definitions, guarded navigation, and route generation logic for the Flutter application.

methods.name: initialRoute
methods.description: Determines the initial route based on whether the user is authenticated. Redirects authenticated users to home, unauthenticated to login.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes based on route settings, applying authentication guards to protected pages and handling route arguments.

methods.name: guardedPushNamed
methods.description: Performs guarded navigation: if the user is authenticated, navigates to the specified route; otherwise, redirects to the login route.
